definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
first half of the night/time before midnight

sentences.english: During the first half of this year, the country added a total of 26 million new Internet users.
sentences.chinese: 在今年的上半年，全國的網民增加了兩千六百萬。

sentences.english: The new Asia-Pacific Hub is expected to be fully operational the first half of 2009.
sentences.chinese: 新的亞太集散中心預期在2009年上半年全面運營。

sentences.english: Mark Viduka's missed header in the first half.
sentences.chinese: 維杜卡上半場錯失的那個頭球。

sentences.english: No matter how steadfast the upper half is , it just can't defeat the weakness of the lower half.
sentences.chinese: 他上半身多麼堅貞，也敵不過下半身的軟弱。

sentences.english: I can still move my upper body.
sentences.chinese: 我的上半身依舊活動自如。

sentences.english: For the first half of the year, complete long-term projects and tie up loose ends.
sentences.chinese: 在今年的上半年，完成長期的計劃並處理好細枝末節。

sentences.english: Just like in Hannover we made too many mistakes in the first half.
sentences.chinese: 就像在漢諾威，我們在上半場犯了太多錯誤。

sentences.english: Wilshere started against Juventus on Saturday and went close with a volley in the first half.
sentences.chinese: 小威在週六與尤文的比賽中首發，上半場有一腳射門。

sentences.english: The first half of 2006 flights per week to 780 sorties .
sentences.chinese: 2006年上半年每週進出港航班爲780架次。

sentences.english: The occurrence of plaque blood fluid does not stagnate, due to stasis in the upper body.
sentences.chinese: 斑的發生是氣血津液不凝滯，鬱積在上半身所致。

sentences.english: But some of the features from the upper part of the body, including the shoulder blade(17) and arms are more ape-like.
sentences.chinese: 但上半身的一些特徵，包括肩胛骨和胳膊更象猿。
匪徒們聯手在上半場拿到了15分。

sentences.english: Something will be changed , the egg will float in the cover of the liquid.
sentences.chinese: 而雞蛋與醋發生了反應，浮在了瓶子的上半部。

sentences.english: For Sevilla, Renato had scored in the 14th minute of the first half.
sentences.chinese: 塞維利亞由雷納託在上半場14分鐘進球。

sentences.english: Only money and bond funds gained ground, according to the report.
sentences.chinese: 上半年，只有貨幣市場基金和債券型基金盈利。

sentences.english: The upper part of the hall was now completely dark.
sentences.chinese: 接着大廳上半部分完全黑下來。

definition: a portion smaller than a half/the lesser part/the smaller part
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
to do with difficulty/to force sb to do sth/reluctant/barely enough
to support/to prop up/to push or move with a pole/to maintain/to open or unfurl/to fill to bursting point/brace/stay/support
